name: SketchBookFantasy Battles
description:
This isn't a fully fledged game.

This game was specifically made to try out the Hud I made,

Sorry if you expected more!!

The Battle will repeat even if you win or loose.

Do remember that this was only worked on for a few days.

But anyways, hope you enjoy~

✦Music Is From Octopath Traveler ( Break & Boost )✦

✦Art By TheAnimatedSketchBook/DeAniSketchbook, Icons By Johan✦

✦Plugins by SumRndmDde, Yanfly, Victor, Mog_Hunter, KMS, Irina✦

Controls:

Z - Accept

X - Cancel

Arrow Keys - Cursor

F4 - Fullscreen ( May or may not work )
